{{flavour|What mahouts steer their elephants with. It basically resembles a fireplace poker with a short, stout handle, and a bluntish spike and hook for communicating one's desires through the pachyderm's thick skin. Curiously enough, [[Ogre]]s are famous for driving larger elephants.}}

{{crawlquote|This weapon falls into the '[[Maces & Flails]]' category. It is a one handed weapon, and it is better for the strong.}}

'''Ankuses''' were bludgeoning weapons with stats slightly superior to [[mace]]s. Much like [[quick blade]]s, if you found an ankus lying on the ground, there was a good chance that it had positive enchantments.

==History==
Ankuses were removed from ''Crawl'' in [[0.11]].
